content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: UpdateSiteScript path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scripts/{script_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name scriptid
desc a serverless script id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum update a serverless script
reqbody
cdnupdatesitescriptrequest
type obj
props
code
type str
format byte
desc base64 encoded contents of a serverless script

scripts may not be larger than 20m
paths
type str
desc the http request paths that are handled by a serverless script
required true
responses
200
cdnupdatesitescriptresponse
type obj
cdnsitescript
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a serverless scripts unique identifier
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack to which a serverless scripts site belongs
siteid
type str
desc the id of the site to which a serverless script belongs
name
type str
desc a serverless scripts name
version
type str
desc a serverless scripts version number

version numbers start at 1 and are incremented every time the script is updated
code
type str
format byte
desc base64 encoded contents of a serverless script
paths
type str
desc the url paths that incoming requests should answer with a serverless script

every serverless script needs at least one path and paths must be unique
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a serverless script was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a serverless script was last updated
desc a serverless script

serverless scripts are hosted and executed on stackpaths edge nodes
desc the response from a request to update an edgeengine script
title: 25_Serverless Scripting_UpdateSiteScript_152.json
